Nthabeleng Likotsi bụ onye South Africa na-ahụ maka ego, onye ọchụnta ego, nwanyị na-azu ahịa, na onye ndu obodo, onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Young Women in Business Network Cooperative Bank
Onye ọchụnta ego South Africa bụ onye guzobere ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke Young Women in Business Network Cooperative Bank, nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ ego nke ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwanyị na-eduzi

Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Young Women in Business Network (YWBN), ụlọ ọrụ nke mụtara ụlọ akụ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na-arụ ọrụ maka itinye ego na mba ahụ na kọntinent. YWBN bụ ụlọ ọrụ ego nke ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwanyị na-eduzi, nke na-ezube inye ndị otu ya ọrụ, na-amụba itinye ego na South Africa na mpaghara Southern Africa.

A mụrụ ya na Botshabelo, Free State Province, na South Africa n'ihe dị ka afọ 1985. O nwere nzere masta na Entrepreneurship na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, nakwa asambodo na Entrepreneurship, site na Wits Business School
O nwekwara asambodo Postgraduate na ndekọ ego, nke o nwetara na Mahadum Johannesburg.
Likotsi malitere YWBN, ya na ndị otu itoolu ndị ọzọ, n'afọ 2009
Ụmụ nwanyị sitere na ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, ha nwere otu ebumnuche nke bu ike akụ na ụba nke ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọchụnta ego na ndị ọkachamara

Kemgbe afọ 2016, Likotsi anọwo na-arụ ọrụ iji gbanwee YWBN Cooperative Bank ka ọ bụrụ YWBN Mutual Bank. E wezụga isi ego a chọrọ nke nọ n'agbata nde rand iri ruo nde rand ịrị na ise, mmadụ chọrọ ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa, isi ego eji arụ ọrụ na ndị ọrụ a zụrụ azụ. Na Friday, 15 June 2018, Reserve Bank of South Africa nabatara ngwa sitere na YWBN iji gbanwee Cooperative Bank ka ọ bụrụ Mutual Bank.

N'afọ 2013, Nthabeleng Likotsi natara onyinye nke 2013/2014 Women Leadership Award n'ọgbakọ Africa-India Partnership Summit nke atọ. Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye nduzi na-abụghị onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, gụnyere Apex Valves Private Limited na Ubuntu Plastics Private Limited
